translations: n．贬值（复数）：指一国货币相对于其他国家货币的价值下降，通常是政府有意为之。
· The government has implemented several devaluations of the national currency.
政府已经实施了几次国家货币的贬值。

sentences.sentence: In a world of competing devaluations, gold keeps driving higher.
sentences.translation: 在一个竞相贬值的世界里，金价就会继续一路攀升。

sentences.sentence: Currency devaluations are the moment when protectionism gets nasty.
sentences.translation: 保护主义最严重的症状就是货币贬值。

sentences.sentence: A recent slide in the yuan has also raised fears of competitive devaluations.
sentences.translation: 近期的人民币贬值更引发了一场对竞争性贬值的恐慌。
